lenders.name: Nicola

lenders.loan_because: I must.

lenders.name: C.J.
lenders.loan_because: I highly respect any business person who has an entrepreneurial spirit!  I think that Kiva.org is a great avenue to encourage and support businesses and individuals around the world.   I am specifically signing up for providing loans, in honor of our dear family dog, Sadie, who recently died.  I want to honor her life by providing money to a wonderful cause.

lenders.name: Khayree
lenders.loan_because: I'm about giving back and helping people who might not be as fortunate as we are in our country,and I think this is a tremendous way of bridging the gaps and bringing the world together.
lenders.occupational_info: I own an Independent Record label by name of RICTASCALE RECORDS LLC, and work can get stressful and time consuming but this is my dream and god gave me the talent and the means to make it happen so I gotta do whatever it takes to get the job done at the end of the day.

lenders.name: Michael

lenders.name: Petr
lenders.loan_because: Kiva makes it really easy and fun to provide other people with needed funds.

lenders.occupational_info: Semi-retired business person.  I know what it means to struggle starting a new business.

lenders.name: Billy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people less fortunate than I.
lenders.occupational_info:
My work involves the transfer of the risk of a loss, from one entity to another, in exchange for a premium, 

Example:  Fire burns your business building and business property.  I provide coverage to replace your building and all your business property for a premium.

lenders.loan_because: It feels great to help people start businesses that will give them the ability to improve their lives.  A relatively small amount can make a big difference.

lenders.occupational_info: I manage a group of computer programmers.

lenders.occupational_info: I am a full time graduate student working on my social work degree. I will use this degree to help those in need, those without a voice, those who the world thinks has no power.

The loans I make are in memory of my mother, Olga, and in honor of my father Nicholas, both of whom shared and share so generously with my brother and me.  Glory to God for all things!

lenders.loan_because: we like to share what we have with people

lenders.loan_because: I makes me feel good and I enjoy helping entrepreneurs.

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.loan_because: I believe that, at some point, everybody on this planet needs a helping hand. I've been through hardships in my life and there were family and friends to help me through. This is the very least that I can do to help others.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: I don't consider money an end unto itself, and I'm happiest making other people happy.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: Giving someone a better day today, (than yesterday), will help them toward an even better tomorrow.
lenders.occupational_info: Started out serving my country (as a WWII & Korean War Marine)... became a VISTA in 2005 and spent a year on Katrina recovery...then as an AmeriCorps VISTA Leader for California's San Joaquin Valley Region. Currently I have gone back to being just a VISTA... working on a new VISTA project we have named "Main Street Values." As may be obvious I am still determined to go out in service to my country. I'm 83, my heart operates on a pacemaker/defibrilator and I can't run a mile in under 4 minutes... but I will get to the finish line with a smile on my face... was I the oldest active VISTA??? A good question... in search of an answer.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: Its nice to be able to help people who want to work to improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: After working as a chemical engineer I have now 'retired' and work in a school.

lenders.name: Book Group Women
lenders.occupation: We're a group of friends who are lending together

lenders.name: Daisy
lenders.loan_because: I've been lucky.

lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference, I really do and...so should YOU!!!

lenders.occupational_info: www.Pingo.com is a global telecom voip provider that helps people make international calls worldwide. We provide a clean prepaid global phone card service to keep the world connected for a whole lot less.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: By loaning rather than giving, not only can the funds be reused and make more of a difference, but the borrowers learn how to manage their money as a business, which helps them long after the money is repaid.

lenders.loan_because:
I have a website, www.pengusaha.biz . It's a FREE classified ads site. I plan it to be a foundation of my economic and my life in the future. but i need to promote it convencionally (traditionaly), by advertising in a newspaper. In Indonesia, a web portal will be popular if it is promoted seriously in both 2 method: Internet and convencional. 
But I have not enough fund to make it happen. I need about USD300 or more.
lenders.occupational_info:
I worked in front of a computer at my little home (actualy, I rent it monthly). Sometimes I call someone or my friends to speak our strategic business plans.
Sometimes too, I develop web-based applications for a new customer. But I have no marketing skill to reach bigger number of customer. So, I ask my friends to do it with profit sharing.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: Of our love of Africa, whose people blessed us with two beautiful daughters; to repay in some small way, to contribute, and join in making life a little better a little bit at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: I help families and children learn how to resolve problems, do better in school and be better friends to help each other.

lenders.name: Charitable Giving
lenders.loan_because: I like the feeling I get inside that comes from knowing I've helped enrich the lives of international global residents. Reaching out to help your fellow man - - just because you can - - is something that shouldn't be missed. Tell your friends about Kiva and the wonderful impact they make on a global scale. It truly is a win/win situation for all involved.
lenders.occupational_info: I strive to help others see the joys in joy life by spreading good cheer and giving positive encouragement. Sports are a terrific outlet for stress, and a chance to spend time with those who share common interests. Although it sometimes can't be avoided, nobody wants to work out in the field all day or be tied to their desk all day; people innately want to have fun! Get out and play with your friends and family whenever you can - - softball, bocce ball, soccer, hiking, even a walk in the park - - fun moments in sports and nature translate into good memories that stay with you long after you're finished playing.

lenders.name: Mary Kelly Mc
lenders.loan_because: I admire these industrious, creative entrepreneurs. I want to contribute to their success so that they, in turn, will be able to employ other people. I am grateful that I am able to participate in this program.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked for many years as a  computer programmer for a large corporation.

lenders.name: Heron
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the potential of mirco-finance to create autonomy and financial security.  More micro-loans!  Less world bank!

lenders.name: Paul Bussey
lenders.loan_because: It is a simple but powerful way to help someone improve their life.  Simply by jump starting their entrepreneurial efforts.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: It takes people to help people.
lenders.occupational_info:
I involve people and companies in community improvement projects that enhance The Human Condition, while promoting social responsibility and teamwork.  

I'm a Kiva volunteer loan editor, founder and captain of the Humanist team and co-captain of the Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and Non-Religious team on Kiva.

lenders.name: Chad
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Michelle & Nick Hansen
lenders.loan_because: We believe in investing in people who are willing to work hard for the dream of a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in medicine and take care of people who have bad arthritis.  I help them to feel better by prescribing medicines or recommending and assisting with surgery.  My husband is an entrepreneur.  He has a custom men's clothing business in Chicago, Illinois.  We both know the extreme dedication and unending hours of work it takes to have your own business.  We are happy we are in a position to work toward achieving not only our dreams but helping others with the ability to fulfill their own.

lenders.name: Tikkun Olam
lenders.loan_because: Helping other people is the right thing to do. As a group of friends we practice Tikkun Olam, fixing the world,  by doing this.
lenders.occupational_info: Our work is to empower people. We help them to help themselves by giving them the tools (money) to make a profit out of their hard work. Then they can feed and clothe their families a little easier.

lenders.name: Hafiz Zahirudin

lenders.name: Woodrow Wilson School
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we want to help the global community and make a difference.  Students in grades  Pre-K to 8 raised money during our Random Acts of Kindness campaign.  Now we are choosing businesses and watching our money change the lives of others around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: We are an integrated arts elementary school that believes in community service.  Our Random Acts of Kindness campaign provides students with the opportunity to learn community and world service through fund-raising and service projects that focus on "it is far greater a gift to give of oneself then to receive".  Such programs foster in children a love, a tolerance, and a respect for humanity...the beginning of a finer and kinder world.

lenders.occupation: Butterfly chaser on The Rainbow Bridge
lenders.loan_because:
Options:  A.  Give a fish, eat for a day; B. Teach to fish, eat forever.
In my view, this is Option B (or, at least, a variant thereof); it allows me to make a difference, one lesson at a time.
lenders.occupational_info:
Chasing butterflies on the Rainbow is a fun way to pass the time while waiting for my humans to make the journey.

"Be patient, Baby Girl.  We'll get there soon enough."--Mom & Dad

lenders.name: Vanja
lenders.loan_because: Helping people better themselves improves the quality of life worlwide.  As I am in a Third World country, development in Africa and other countries similar, is of great importance to society, not only in the home country, but also worldwide.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to manage in a huge retail store in South Africa, but got fired/retrenched due to BEE (Black Employment Empowerment), which specified that 75% of the staff was supposed to be non-caucassian.  This sort of mentality within a country is unacceptable.  People should have equal rights everywhere.  Work should be earned on merit, not the colour of your skin.
